snippet: A sell-off in small-company stocks added to weak first-quarter numbers from Walmart and Kohl’s.
abstract: Investors retreat from stocks, giving the Dow Jones industrial average its worst day in five weeks, after disappointing earnings from Walmart Stores and mixed news about the global economy.
lead_paragraph: A sell-off in small-company stocks added to weak first-quarter numbers from Walmart and Kohl’s.

headline.main: Shares Fall After Mixed Economic News
headline.print_headline: Shares Fall After Mixed Economic News
